from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
r_eq = "r_0*2^(1/6)"
dissociation= "(4)*U_0*( math.pow( r0/ r_eq,12) - math.pow( r0/ r_eq,6) )* 1e-23"
problem.p:
The Lennard-Jones equation shown below gives the potential energy of two atoms when they are separated by a distance \(r\).
\[ U(r)=4 U_0 \left[\left(\frac{r_0}{r}\right)^{12}-\left(\frac{r_0}{r}\right)^6\right]\]

part.p: What is the distance between atoms at the condition of stable equilibrium? (Enter \(r_0\) or \(U_0\) by typing r_0 or U_0 by using the click-on-text below.)

problem.part: What is the minimum work needed to completely dissociate the molecule by separating the atoms from each other? (Enter \(r_0\) or \(U_0\) by typing r_0 or U_0 by using the click-on-text below.)
